scripts.i: cd web && npm i && cd ../api && npm i
scripts.start: concurrent "cd web && npm start" "cd api && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: cross-env SERVICE_URL=https://va0.herokuapp.com npm run build_web && node copy-build.js
scripts.build_web: cd web && npm i && npm run build
scripts.heroku: cd api && npm i && npm run start_heroku
